mapper.select: SELECT a.com_no, a.com_content, TO_CHAR(a.com_date, 'yyyy/MM/dd HH24:mi') AS com_Date, c.name, u.profile_img, a.id, b.board_no FROM com a JOIN users u ON(a.id=u.id) JOIN user_info c ON(u.emp_no = c.emp_no) JOIN board b ON(a.board_no = b.board_no) WHERE b.board_no = #{boardNo}
